website_summaries.verdict: You'll be hard pressed to find a better value on a golf club travel case, as long as you're okay with carrying it.
pros: Soft travel case with thick padding
Collapsible when not in use for easy storage
Made of durable fabric that won't tear easily
Large enough to fit your whole golf bag
cons: No wheels, so you must carry the bag and this may get heavy

customer_reviews.title: Stitching on handle gave way 1st time using it
customer_reviews.text: The bag served its purpose for protecting the clubs during my recent golf vacation, however during its first and only use the stitching that holds the handle to the bag ripped away. Hasn't affected functionality, but I believe it will continue to rip severely limiting the life of the bag.
customer_reviews.author: m_marad

customer_reviews.title: Cheap bag, but you'll get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: Didn't even make it one complete flight. I realize it was a cheaper option, but my clubs aren't super expensive and wanted to save some money from renting clubs. Waste of money, if you ask me.
customer_reviews.author: Brent

customer_reviews.title: Glad I bought this
customer_reviews.text: Just used this bag on a golfing trip and it was great...espcially for the price. I was able to fit my clubs, a softsided cooler AND my golf shoes/socks that were in a bag all inside this bag. No, it doesn't have wheels but for my occasional use it's perfect. I was able to slip my arm under the straps and carry it on my shoulder which made it much easier to carry. Really glad I bought it. Just to give you an idea I'm a 5'3" female.
customer_reviews.author: Deidre

customer_reviews.title: a great bag with good quality
customer_reviews.text: Aside from not having wheels, a great bag with good quality. Easy to carry as a "back bag" like a backpack. 2 flights and not even a scuff. My friends bag is not faring as well and it cost double!
customer_reviews.author: PuntaCana Mike

customer_reviews.title: Absolute minimum of protection if those clubs are taking a plane ride.
customer_reviews.text: Absolute minimum the airlines will accept as club protection, and they are right. I still had to sign a waiver for not using a hard case. The case and carry handles are sturdy enough. The zipper seems to be beefy enough. I still used a 1/2" dowel cut to a little taller than my longest driver and topped it with a tennis ball. Wrapped the club heads individually in bubble wrap and zipped it up for transport. nothing was damaged in transit from South Florida to Michigan and back.
customer_reviews.author: swpearce

customer_reviews.title: Product didn’t last through one trip
customer_reviews.text: The zipper broke on this bag at some point between my flights on my first use. I had to wrap the bag with duct tape just to get my clubs home. We’ll see if my clubs aren’t damaged here in a few hours. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew K Hendricks

customer_reviews.title: Save your money. Tore the first trip, really ...
customer_reviews.text: Save your money. Tore the first trip, really nothing but a nylon bag ,Buy a club glove and be done with it.
customer_reviews.author: Dale Dehn

customer_reviews.title: Great bag for a nice price
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this bag in 2016 so its been on several flights with me around the country. I wanted something lightweight and easy to store when not in use but also not super expensive. I have read some of the recent negative reviews and perhaps the quality control has gone down but mine is still in great shape after a dozen or so trips. I did pick up a telescoping club protector stick to protect my driver and 3W and pleased with purchase. Only downside is it does not roll but I usually use my lighter carry golf bag and put my shoes in my regular luggage to save on weight.
customer_reviews.author: C Rose

customer_reviews.title: Great for occasional travel
customer_reviews.text: Great bag for the price! Because there aren't wheels you'll likely want to get an airport travel cart to help you. The straps are sturdy enough that you can carry it if you want, but it's exhausting. Then again, it's less expensive because it doesn't have wheels. If you're not travelling with your golf clubs often, it's a good choice. If you DO travel often with your golf clubs, I'd recommend a model with wheels.
customer_reviews.author: SoCal Guy 333

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality for such an inexpensive golf bag holder
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality for such an inexpensive golf bag holder. It has now travelled by air from the US to the UK. My golf bag and clubs were well protected and the travel cover looks as good as new.
customer_reviews.author: LaMorff

customer_reviews.title: This is great! I personally wouldn't use it on an airline ...
customer_reviews.text: This is great! I personally wouldn't use it on an airline - but other reviewers did & thought it was great. I'll defer to them. I'm really finicky about my clubs. I play all over & have a hatch back car so people w/nefarious purposes could see it. This is great - and makes it Way easier to get the clubs in & out at the bag drop. Perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Kay Tracy

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for!
customer_reviews.text: The bag had a tear after first flight. Just got back from my trip and I missed the return window. I guess you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: A.Irvine

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply Made
customer_reviews.text: This bag fell apart shortly before the return trip I purchased it for. It was working fine, however it ripped at the seams for the handles when loading by golf bag back into it. Not satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: tlemense

customer_reviews.title: Solid product
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for a single trip, no tears or damage to the bag. Was very tight fit to get my driver in, but it is thick. Perfect for the price. If using frequently, would recommend paying more for wheels. But this worked great for me since I'm disabled and can't carry it anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Lilback

customer_reviews.title: It didn’t work.
customer_reviews.text: My bag broke while inside of this while traveling on the airplane. It’d have been better to buy a hard case.
customer_reviews.author: Steviepco

customer_reviews.title: Protects my equipment and fits my custom cart bag perfectly.
customer_reviews.text: I keep my clubs in the back of my truck which has an abrasive bet liner. I didn't want to ruin my new bag and club covers on the rough surface. This bag is perfect. Protects my equipment and fits my custom cart bag perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: MS

customer_reviews.title: Its in the bag!
customer_reviews.text: Nice bag for the price, I only travel about 2-3 times a year and use ship-sticks. this bag shows up as good as it goes out. no issue with the size, zippers or quality. A must have if you occasionally travel with your clubs.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Young

customer_reviews.title: Spend $25 More and Get a Better Bag
customer_reviews.text: I bought this inexpensive bag before a golf trip last year. Used it once and the straps began to tear off. Use again last week and they tore further. My friend had the amazon basics bag that is $25-30 more than I paid for this and the difference was dramatic. Wheels, heavier grade nylon, stronger straps with rivots. The Izzo people could easily fix this with better stitching or a few simple rivots at the stress points. You can still hold it straight up and down by the handles and get it through the airport but makes to feel bad to have such a cheap product.
customer_reviews.author: Billy Bob

customer_reviews.title: Bad stitching
customer_reviews.text: Like some other reviewers, I also had the handle tear loose while trying to retrieve my bag from an airline carousel. I took it to a auto upholsterer and had him restitch all of the 4 straps. He says that the straps were only stitched to the thin outer fabric and not all the way through to the thick inner padding. Plus he said that the thread was cheap as well. At least now with the modification of stitching I can feel safer about the cover holding up.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel J.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Did a great job protecting my golf clubs when shipped across the US. Surprisingly more padded and durable than I expected for such a great price. Nice travel bag, I recommend getting a Bag Backbone (also available on Amazon) for extra, extra protection for clubs, but isn't nessesarily needed.
customer_reviews.author: iheartrum

customer_reviews.title: Secure Your Clubs
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a durable travel cover for my clubs. I am very pleased with the style, quality, holds its shape, and has a full zipper so it's easy to put a bag of clubs into it. In particular, I wanted two side zippers that met at the top so I could add a padlock to secure the clubs from theft or other. This was a great buy. at only $25.
customer_reviews.author: Tess

customer_reviews.title: AND it looks Good
customer_reviews.text: Full enough, lite enough and it looks that it will handle some rough roads. Its packed with my golf bag, golf clubs, shoes and everything I will need for a few months in Florida.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie O'Donnell

customer_reviews.title: Light, roomy & sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son to use to carry his fencing gear, as fencing bags are much more expensive (for no apparent reason). This bag is lightweight and very roomy, and seems sturdy so far.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney N

customer_reviews.title: This is a no frills bag for a cost effective price
customer_reviews.text: The bag doesn't have any additional features like pockets, or shoe areas. It also does not have wheels or rollers. But, it is big enough for your full set and full size driver. You can stuff the bag with shoes and other things around the clubs too. The price is low and the bag does its job. If you need a cheap option for your kids clubs on vacation, this will do the job nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: for the price it's awesome. Plenty of room for bag
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for a one time deal. The price was well worth the quality this bag has. My clubs were shipped both ways and found no problem or damaged to my clubs. This bag still has lot of life left for more trips...for the price it's awesome. Plenty of room for bag, clubs and shoes and other needed items and golfer might have as long you don't go over the weight limit the Airline of your choice might impose. Have no regrets buying it.
customer_reviews.author: R. A. Moran

customer_reviews.title: Great value, great product.
customer_reviews.text: Was able to fit TWO of my grandson's junior clubs and bags into this one bag for their flight back home.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas C Mulvihill

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Descent padding. I use it to transport clubs in car as well. It holds everything tight and is easy to open. Not advised for carrying a long ways. There is no shoulder strap. Great for the price
customer_reviews.author: Swoolson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Use it for storage of extra bag/clubs, will probably buy another for main bag.
customer_reviews.author: Ownh

customer_reviews.title: Once you learn to hold the bag like a golf bag instead of trying to carry it ...
customer_reviews.text: This bag works well for the price. Once you learn to hold the bag like a golf bag instead of trying to carry it like a piece of luggage, it is easy to get from place to place.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Kleptach

customer_reviews.title: Keeps my bag & clubs clean in the garage between rounds.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this bag to keep my bag and clubs clean while stored in the garage. For my needs this bag works great, but I would not use it if I was checking my clubs with an airline.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Sanders

customer_reviews.title: The pricing of this golf bag was perfect. Since most golf bags take a beating there ...
customer_reviews.text: The pricing of this golf bag was perfect. Since most golf bags take a beating there is not use in purchase one that is expensive although you would never know the difference in looking at this one. I am certain it will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: liz

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Excellent. Please buy. We packed our clubs here to check it as a bag at the airport- it’s big enough where you can even pack some clothes in it.
customer_reviews.author: Apple T

customer_reviews.title: Nice bag for the money
customer_reviews.text: Nice bag for the money. Good quality zipper and can fit shoes and other items as well. We did bubble wrap around the clubs to protect them. Unfortunately the airlines managed to put a small rip in the bottom of the bag but all was fine inside. Not a large rip so bag in still in great shape. Not the bag's fault, last time we traveled they tore off the wheels on a piece of our luggage! Oh well...
customer_reviews.author: DeeRac

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Bag
customer_reviews.text: It was exactly what I was looking for - something light weight to ship a few clubs, tennis rackets/balls, and clothes in! Love how its padded!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very compact bag with great quality.
customer_reviews.text: I usually don't write reviews, but this bag is worth it. When I saw the picture of a guy holding the bag, I thought the bag would have no shape, low quality, but for $30, it was ok. When I got it, I was surprised. Take a look at my pictures. Nice design, and don't look cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Paulo G. Pinheiro

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality Bag
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this cover to protect my golf bad in the back of my pickup. Received it toad and I was impressed with the quality. Well made and large enough to put my full size cart bag with clubs inside. It was exactly what I was looking for and better than I thought it would be for the price. I would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: James G. Ch,itwood II

customer_reviews.title: Does it’s job
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t have wheels so I got a workout in the San Antonio airport
customer_reviews.author: Jared E. Moll

customer_reviews.title: Good bag. Would be better if it had a ...
customer_reviews.text: Good bag. Would be better if it had a spilder strap and/or wheels
customer_reviews.author: MDD51

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Great bag. I keep my clubs in the trunk of my car so it keeps them secure and no bag clank one my irons.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Hanley

customer_reviews.title: Got the job done
customer_reviews.text: Not a ton of support but I knew that going into it. I ended up just wrapping a beach towel around the head of all my clubs to fill some of the empty space in the bag. Survived 4 flights in total with no damage to the bag or any of my clubs. Great cheap option if you're not planning on traveling regularly, would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Matt Fuller

customer_reviews.title: Been with me through many flights
customer_reviews.text: Took it though two continents and many flight connections. Not a scratch. Held up without any tears. Fantastic item/ material.
customer_reviews.author: SunsetAir

customer_reviews.title: but I would say overall a good product for the price
customer_reviews.text: A little small, really had to jam my clubs in there, but I would say overall a good product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: JL

customer_reviews.title: Recommended.
customer_reviews.text: Used this when flying, worked well. I also purchased a special stick that makes the top firm so it protects the club. Flew from NY to VA and back without any problems. Seems well built
customer_reviews.author: James Milton

customer_reviews.title: Good soft case for the money
customer_reviews.text: Good golf bag that kept my clubs safe while traveling. If you have long drivers you may have to take the club head off to fit it.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon S

customer_reviews.title: It served me well!
customer_reviews.text: Love the light weight and quality. Just what I needed to to pack clothes, clubs and shoes for one check baggage fee
customer_reviews.author: Paige Webb

customer_reviews.title: Very basic (no wheels) and good quality and build
customer_reviews.text: I picked this up at the last minute and it performed well on the trip. Very basic (no wheels) and good quality and build. I would buy it again but would probably upgrade to a wheeled version.
customer_reviews.author: ClarkG

customer_reviews.title: Awesome value for money
customer_reviews.text: For the price you can’t go wrong! I don’t expect it to last forever but for an infrequent golf traveler and for winter storage - awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Ash

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great value
customer_reviews.text: Great product, took it on several flights on a golfing trip, no issues or damage to any clubs. Plenty of space to fit my golf bag, shoes, extra clothes. The bag has more padding than I expected and I was not worried about my clubs.
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: Probably would have been smarter to get one with wheels.
customer_reviews.author: John Zaitz

customer_reviews.title: Great for light usage
customer_reviews.text: Have only used the bag once, but it held up well on my trip from SF to Scottsdale. Would recommend if you're looking for a soft bag that is durable
customer_reviews.author: only1tonywin

customer_reviews.title: ... of extra room and the wheels make it very easy to get through the airport
customer_reviews.text: This golf bag has a ton of extra room and the wheels make it very easy to get through the airport. This bag did get a small hole in it after the first time traveling but it's not a big deal. Overall it's a good product at a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Sherri

customer_reviews.title: Great Value for a No Frills Cover
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed for an unexpected golf outing. No issues with you it held up on the plane.
customer_reviews.author: TN Guy

customer_reviews.title: A Great Bargain for the Casual Traveler!
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag! Very reasonably priced and it work just as expected! If I traveled a lot I might want one with wheels but since I don't this one was perfect!
customer_reviews.author: James Newcomb

customer_reviews.title: Protects as described.
customer_reviews.text: Light weight and protective enough for checking on flights. I do use and extender to protect my woods and driver in addition.
customer_reviews.author: Mike L

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Value
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice travel bag, slightly padded, and allows for some additional items in addition to the golf bag itself. For the price I found this bag to be a great value.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Smith

customer_reviews.title: This bag is good quality and protected my clubs well on a recent ...
customer_reviews.text: This bag is good quality and protected my clubs well on a recent trip. The only reason I didn't give it 5 stars is because it doesn't have wheels which come in very handy if you have to carry it a long way in the airport. But for the price it is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: R. Blosio

customer_reviews.title: Nice travel bag
customer_reviews.text: Nice travel bag. A quality bag especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: David S.

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price but not long lasting
customer_reviews.text: Bag held up for one trip but the straps are already ripping
customer_reviews.author: Cortnie Gier

customer_reviews.title: Good Basic travel Bag
customer_reviews.text: Great for sporadic use. Large enough for large drivers. Well constructed. No wheels, so if you need to drag long distances, that is the only drawback. But for 1 or 2x a year, no brainer.
customer_reviews.author: Healey Boy

customer_reviews.title: Great Soft Bag
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice, affordable, well made soft bag, I just bought a 3rd for my son’s clubs. They make it easy to transport your clubs and keep the dust off in the garage. It holds our big Titlest bag and my wife’s lightweight bag equally well.
customer_reviews.author: Recent Buyer

customer_reviews.title: One trip and done
customer_reviews.text: Ripped on the first trip. It did protect my clubs during they first trip but I'm very worried about my return trip home. Not sure I'd trust using it again
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Notestine

customer_reviews.title: Put wheels on the bag.
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. No complaints. If I had it to do over, I would have ordered a bag with wheels, but this ok.
customer_reviews.author: james m dunn

customer_reviews.title: Have not used it yet. However, inspecting it ...
customer_reviews.text: Have not used it yet. However, inspecting it indicates my long driver will fit. Also, it appears to be quality made. I will let you know after my February 2017 trip to the West coast.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy in N. Carolina

customer_reviews.title: Great value, can't wait to travel with this
customer_reviews.text: Great value, can't wait to travel with this. Wish I ordered this a few years ago. Fits my Ping Hoofer carry bag with standard size irons, 3 wood, and driver with room for golf shoes.
customer_reviews.author: dd1153

customer_reviews.title: The bag was made of material that was heavy duty ...
customer_reviews.text: The bag was made of material that was heavy duty. The straps to carry the bag since it didn't have rollers could have been padded.
customer_reviews.author: David Sharp

customer_reviews.title: Great, however strap broke while in airport
customer_reviews.text: Great, however strap broke while in airport. Would recommend buying something with wheels or ability to go over the shoulde. However, for the cheap price it as decent.
customer_reviews.author: wendy

customer_reviews.title: Does the job well at a good price
customer_reviews.text: Very basic travel bag for your clubs but does the job well. Has been on a number of international flights with me now and has not damaged my clubs nor rip or torn. Can recommend, especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: thelastfrontier

customer_reviews.title: Good Value- better Than Expected For Price
customer_reviews.text: I just flew across country with one layover. The bag held up well. Great quality for the price. Only gripe is I wish the bag had wheels. Good for occasional use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great golf bag cover.
customer_reviews.text: Great golf bag cover. I have a fairly large golf bag with a 46 inch driver. This cover easily zips up and encloses everything. It's got a handle that makes it easy to carry.
customer_reviews.author: Stock Player

customer_reviews.title: Great buy !
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Held up for over seas travel and was even able to stuff other travel items in along with my clubs. I highly recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Robert Cathey

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: Great for the price...needs the extension protector...but I took my clubs/shoes/fly rod/reel/fly cases to Ireland and back...no damage
customer_reviews.author: calder t macmullen

customer_reviews.title: Impressive Bag for the Money!
customer_reviews.text: This looks like a great bag for $35! The fabric looks tough and the handle straps appear to be attached solidly. The weak link might be the zipper but then zippers are expensive so that would jack the price. The zipper appears adequate but is not the toughest I've ever seen. Overall, I'm impressed with the quality but will have to wait for my trip to see how it holds up once I turn it over to the Bag Smashers.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Grieb

customer_reviews.title: Good construction but no wheels
customer_reviews.text: Good construction. Great size just wish it had wheels but folds up compactly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for - get wheels.
customer_reviews.text: The bag came as expected. Should’ve invested in the one with wheels. That said, the strap ripped on first time use because I had to carry around my clubs in the bag without wheels.
customer_reviews.author: Michael D. Fenlon

customer_reviews.title: Fit my standard clubs and bag. Transported through airport ...
customer_reviews.text: Fit my standard clubs and bag. Transported through airport security with no issues. There is plenty of padding which surprised me after paying as little as i did. Well worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: tnoons

customer_reviews.title: Very cost effective bag
customer_reviews.text: Cost effective bag for someone who only expects to travel with golf clubs once every few years.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: "FOUR"
customer_reviews.text: The bag fit my son's golf set perfectly. I was lightweight and the price was good. He was very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: justinesally

customer_reviews.title: No wheels but not bad carrying
customer_reviews.text: Had a cross country flight if you have no worries carrying it it held up great no rips or anything clubs were in perfect shape. I did wrap the irons in a towel inside the bag worked out great.
customer_reviews.author: Katy

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: Good deal but needs a shoulder strap, wheels or slick coating at bottom so it can be dragged. Unwieldy getting through airports.
customer_reviews.author: bridge

customer_reviews.title: I am very pleased with the item
customer_reviews.text: The product protected my clubs very well. I am very pleased with the item. The padding was thin but sufficient to protect them on an airline.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick F.

customer_reviews.title: I am now back home and the bag looks like new. It paid for itself in one trip
customer_reviews.text: I used this bag to take my clubs to San Diego this winter. I am now back home and the bag looks like new. It paid for itself in one trip. If you need to carry it for a good distance I would recommend getting the wheeled version.
customer_reviews.author: Ken F

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Took these to Colorado. Great product for the price!! Still in great shape and they looked very respectable for such a cheap buy.
customer_reviews.author: JAM

customer_reviews.title: Good size
customer_reviews.text: Good size and light weight bag. Fit my pretty large golf bag with some extra clubs as well as my shoes and a couple boxes of balls with room to spare
customer_reviews.author: David S.

customer_reviews.title: It's okay considering the price
customer_reviews.text: It does not have wheels what it might make it a little uncomfortable, but for 30$ is fair.
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo

customer_reviews.title: Get one with wheels!
customer_reviews.text: Worked great on first trip with no issues. Wished I had bought one with wheels, as the position of the straps makes it a load to carry through airport
customer_reviews.author: Gdog in DE

customer_reviews.title: Great bag, great price.
customer_reviews.text: Functional, does what it was intended to do, especially for the price. It would be nice if it had wheels, but for the price I'll still give it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin from Maryland

customer_reviews.title: Ripped at the seems during first usage.
customer_reviews.text: Headline says it all, product didn't even complete it's first shipping without tearing at the seam, tear is over a foot in length.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not my bag☹️
customer_reviews.text: The opening does not make it easy to load with the driver in the bag
customer_reviews.author: Terry W.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Used for a quick trip to the west coast, no problems!
customer_reviews.author: BRITB

customer_reviews.title: Great looking product
customer_reviews.text: Great looking product. Looks durable. Thought it would be a little bit taller. Testing it out this weekend. Hopefully it does it's job!
customer_reviews.author: Kenny Kenido

customer_reviews.title: the cover offered a good protection to my golf clubs on my recent trip
customer_reviews.text: It was difficult at first fit my clubs in the cover. The second time the clubs fitted in much easier. Overall, the cover offered a good protection to my golf clubs on my recent trip.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price and it's pretty sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I've used this with the Bag Boy Backbone about 5 times and it's done the job so far. Great for the price and it's pretty sturdy, but I think I will buy one with wheels next time.
customer_reviews.author: Jay S

customer_reviews.title: Fit my husbands golf clubs and held up good during travel
customer_reviews.text: Fit my husbands golf clubs and held up good during travel. Only traveled once but airlines are rough and it didn't tear.
customer_reviews.author: M21

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Survived a DFW to ATL flight without issue...all I can ask.
customer_reviews.author: Zezacle582

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed for air travel.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed for the upcoming boys golf trip to Phoenix.
customer_reviews.author: axtionjaxson77

customer_reviews.title: Great bag for traveling or  flying
customer_reviews.text: Great bag for traveling or flying. We have only used it once so far but it held up well! I would recommend this to anyone else.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal L.

customer_reviews.title: great value. exactly as advertised
customer_reviews.text: both bags made it back and forth over the pacific unscathed. wrapped some towels over the club heads for added padding.
customer_reviews.author: o.h.  lee

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Amazing quality golf bag at a great price. Easily fits the longest club you have!
customer_reviews.author: Chris Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Well made. Lightweight. Just what I needed for air travel.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not bad. Would be better if it came with a ...
customer_reviews.text: Not bad. Would be better if it came with a shoulder strap or wheels. If you're using this to transport clubs through an airport like most buyers probably are, get ready to walk long distances while awkwardly holding the bag's two carry handles.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

product_meta.title: Izzo Golf Padded Golf Travel Cover
product_meta.description: Grab, go, golf! The Izzo Golf Padded Travel Cover is just what you’ve been searching for to get the perfect travel companion without the stress of leaving clubs behind, or worrying about scratching. It’s ready for the action and can easily support your basic transportation needs without all the wear and tear other travel covers can easily get! The padded soft case protects your clubs in transit, so never worry about unwanted marks or dirt again! Plus, the lightweight Izzo Golf Padded Travel Cover comes with a durable vinyl base that adds extra protection without all the unwanted extra weight. It’s only two pounds you’ll have to carry to get to your desired destination. Worried about shoulder soreness? Our Golf Padded Travel Cover has additional pad protection on the straps to provide you with some bonus comfort while you’re lugging your clubs around the course. Our straps are made perfect for carrying. It expands to 50” and collapses to 7.5” so it’s easy and convenient to store when you’re done using it for the golf season! The Padded Golf Travel Cover is the perfect size for an entire set of golf clubs, so never regret leaving some clubs at home while you’re on the course again.
feature_bullets: Padded soft case protects your clubs in transit
Durable vinyl base provides added protection
Padded carry strap for added comfort
Expands to 51'' x 14'' x 12'' (collapses to 14" x 12'' x 7.5'')
Easy to transport and takes up limited space in storage

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
